content: bring playful charm to your décor with this delightful crochet penguin ornament from red heart super saver super craft kit materials red heart® super saver® super craft kit™ kit includes 12 balls 1 7 oz/50 g each 21 oz/600g total yardage 93 yds/85 m each 1116 yds/1020 m total contrast a gray heather 1 ball or 18yds/17 m contrast b black 1 ball or 6 yds/5 m contrast c soft white 1 ball or 3 yds/2 5 m contrast d pumpkin 1 ball or 3 yds/ 2 5 m contrast e jade 1 ball or 6 yds/5 m measurement approx 5 12 5 cm
